WorkItem.Description:
my character name is chinese, when i using rawr4 try to find data of my character. but is always show in load processing. i sniff the data of rawr4. found the server return Sorry, an error occurred while processing your request.   rawr2 can show my character. but its has some problem with show item.   =======================return========================== HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error Cache-Control: private Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Server: Microsoft-IIS/7.0 X-AspNetMvc-Version: 2.0 X-AspNet-Version: 4.0.30319 X-Powered-By: ASP.NET MicrosoftOfficeWebServer: 5.0_Pub MS-Author-Via: MS-FP/4.0 Date: Sun, 30 Jan 2011 19:04:54 GMT Content-Length: 90        

Sorry, an error occurred while processing your request.

    =============================my post================== GET /%e4%bd%bf%e5%be%92%e6%96%b0%e7%94%9f@tw-%e6%9a%97%e5%bd%b1%e4%b9%8b%e6%9c%88 HTTP/1.1 Accept: */* Referer: http://elitistjerks.com/clientscript/Rawr.Silverlight.xap Accept-Language: zh-CN Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; MSIE 9.0; Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/5.0) Host: www.rawr4.com Connection: Keep-Alive
WorkItem.Summary: [LoadCharacter] Entering a Chinese name always returns Not Found

Comments.Message: Can you please type out the actual character name you are trying to load?

my other character is 
<Name>使徒新生</Name>
<Realm>暗影之月</Realm>
i don t know you web explorer can show the chinese word
i give you my character in utf8 encode.
%E4%BD%BF%E5%BE%92%E6%96%B0%E7%94%9F

and this is armory link http://tw.wowarmory.com/character-sheet.xml?r=Shadowmoon&cn=%E4%BD%BF%E5%BE%92%E6%96%B0%E7%94%9F

Direct Translation is:
Name: Apostolic Returns
Realm: Shadow of the month
But I do not see how that helps any. Just interesting...

Most everything is readable, Just those chinese chacaters, but not much of an issue. The biggest problem is, it is not like the battle.net site. There would have to be special code or version to support this language as it gets its information from tw.wowarmory.com
Wait, has China moved to the new battle.net setup? We aren't reading wowarmory.com at all anymore (for any region).
As far as I can tell China has tw.battle.net but I can not read a thing on it, nor can I find out how to pull up a toon while using it.

1) China doesn't have Cata yet, much less a battle.net armory
2) Taiwan has Cata, but not a battle.net armory, so we can't supposed them yet
3) Kora has Cata and a battle.net armory and we are working to support it now
